titleStmt.title: The present danger of Tangier, or, An account of its being attempted by a great army of the Moors by land, and under some apprehensions of the French at sea in a letter from Cadiz dated the 29th of July (old stile) 1679, to a friend in England.
titleStmt.author: E. M.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
